ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
DV8 is sent in Japan, to get back the technology of StormWatch which allows them the teleportation.
During the mission, Copycat is teleported and retained prisoner in a virtual reality. Threshold orders the fold, but the team rebels, renders harmless him and succeeds in freeing releasing Copycat.
This one attacks then Powerhaus, because while she was trapped in a virtual reality, her various personalities became to be integrated into the others.
Sublime decide to go home, without the technology of StormWatch.
